pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Sunday, November 13, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Phnom Penh, Cambodia

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the 2nd ASEAN Global Dialogue.

Note for media:

  • Host broadcaster coverage

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Secretary-General of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN), Lim Jock Hoi.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the closing ceremony of the 40th and 41st ASEAN Summits.

Note for media:

  • Open coverage and host broadcaster coverage

1:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of the Philippines, Ferdinand Marcos Jr.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion on women’s role in peace and security.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage of opening remarks

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Tuol Sleng Genocide Museum.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
